### Changed
- Upgraded upstream chart from 6.16.0 to 6.18.0 - see [changelog](https://github.com/grafana/loki/blob/main/production/helm/loki/CHANGELOG.md) for more information.
  - This upgrades Loki from 3.1.0 to 3.2.0.
